General.Name: Duc Long Gia Lai Group JSC
General.Description: Duc Long Gia Lai Group JSC engages in agriculture, real estate, energy, infrastructure, manufacturing components, and electronic equipment businesses in Vietnam. The company is involved in manufacturing of electronic components; construction of infrastructure projects, including highways generation and distribution of hydropower, wind power, and solar power; development of real estate projects, such as apartments, villas, townhouses, shop-house, officetel, and resort villas; provision of security services and professional bodyguards; operation of hotels and resorts; and wood production and processing activities. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Pleiku, Vietnam.
